event.description: {CovLStrv2{{t{The case for value {0} is not terminated by a 'break' statement.}{{code{'X'}}}}}}
{CovLStrv2{{t{The above case falls through to this one.}}}}

typePropertiesGroup.localEffect: Execution falls through to the next case statement or default; this might indicate a common typo.
typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: Missing break statement between cases in switch statement

event.description: {CovLStrv2{{t{The case for value {0} is not terminated by a 'break' statement.}{{code{'f'}}}}}}
{CovLStrv2{{t{The above case falls through to this one.}}}}

typePropertiesGroup.localEffect: Execution falls through to the next case statement or default; this might indicate a common typo.
typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: Missing break statement between cases in switch statement
